statements: SELECT * FROM currency_transactions WHERE amount > 100
SELECT user_id, amount, transaction_date FROM currency_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT transaction_type, amount FROM currency_transactions WHERE user_id = 123
SELECT user_id, MAX(amount) AS max_amount FROM currency_transactions GROUP BY user_id
SELECT COUNT(transaction_id) AS total_transactions FROM currency_transactions
SELECT * FROM currency_transactions WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, amount FROM currency_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM currency_transactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_amount > 5000;
SELECT transaction_type, COUNT(*) AS transaction_count FROM currency_transactions GROUP BY transaction_type ORDER BY transaction_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM currency_transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM currency_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date FROM currency_transactions WHERE player_id = 1001;
SELECT player_id, amount FROM currency_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT purchase_id, item_name, price FROM purchases WHERE player_id = 2002 ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM currency_transactions;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE item_id = 1
SELECT purchase_date, item_name, price FROM purchases ORDER BY purchase_date DESC
SELECT player_id, COUNT(*) FROM currency_transactions GROUP BY player_id
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM currency_transactions WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY amount DESC, transaction_id ASC
SELECT player_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM currency_transactions GROUP BY player_id HAVING total_amount > 500
SELECT * FROM Players
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM Players ORDER BY player_level DESC
SELECT item_name, purchase_date FROM Purchases WHERE player_id = 1001
SELECT currency_amount FROM CurrencyTransactions WHERE currency_amount > 500 ORDER BY currency_amount ASC
SELECT player_name, currency_balance FROM Players WHERE player_level >= 50
SELECT player_name, currency_balance FROM Players ORDER BY player_name ASC
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM Players WHERE currency_balance >= 1000 ORDER BY player_level DESC
SELECT player_name, item_name, purchase_date FROM Purchases WHERE player_id = 101 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC

SELECT player_name, purchase_date, currency_amount FROM Players JOIN CurrencyTransactions ON Players.player_id = CurrencyTransactions.transaction_id WHERE currency_amount > 500 ORDER BY purchase_date ASC
SELECT player_name, player_level, currency_balance FROM Players WHERE player_level BETWEEN 5 AND 10 ORDER BY currency_balance DESC
SELECT * FROM currency_balance;
SELECT user_id, balance FROM currency_balance ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM item_catalog WHERE price > 50;
SELECT item_id, item_name FROM item_catalog ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, timestamp FROM currency_transactions WHERE amount < 0;
SELECT * FROM currency_balance ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, balance FROM currency_balance WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM currency_transactions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT c.item_name, p.timestamp FROM item_catalog c INNER JOIN purchase_history p ON c.item_id = p.item_id;
SELECT t.user_id, t.timestamp FROM currency_transactions t WHERE t.amount > (SELECT AVG(amount) FROM currency_transactions);
SELECT * FROM currency_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT player_id, player_name FROM players WHERE player_score > 1000;
SELECT item_id, item_name, item_price FROM items WHERE rarity_level = 3;
SELECT transaction_type, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM currency_transactions GROUP BY transaction_type;
SELECT player_name, purchase_item, purchase_date FROM players JOIN purchases ON players.player_id = purchases.player_id;
SELECT * FROM players;
SELECT player_name, player_score FROM players ORDER BY player_score DESC;
SELECT purchase_item, purchase_amount, purchase_date FROM purchases WHERE purchase_amount > 100;
SELECT player_name, item_name, quantity FROM players INNER JOIN player_inventory ON players.player_id = player_inventory.player_id INNER JOIN items ON player_inventory.item_id = items.item_id;

SELECT player_name, SUM(purchase_amount) AS total_purchase_amount FROM players INNER JOIN purchases ON players.player_id = purchases.player_id GROUP BY player_name ORDER BY total_purchase_amount DESC;
